title: Pelican Configuration
description: Configuration for Pelican static site generator

site_url.description: Base URL for the site (SITEURL in Pelican)

content_path.description: Path to content directory (PATH in Pelican)

output_path.description: Directory where generated files will be saved (OUTPUT_PATH in Pelican)

theme.description: Theme name or path (THEME in Pelican)

delete_output_directory.description: Delete the output directory and all contents before generating (DELETE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY in Pelican)

ignore_files.description: Patterns of files/directories to ignore during processing (IGNORE_FILES in Pelican)

static_paths.description: Directories containing static files to copy to output (STATIC_PATHS in Pelican)

article_paths.description: Directories to look for articles (ARTICLE_PATHS in Pelican)

page_paths.description: Directories to look for pages (PAGE_PATHS in Pelican)

default_pagination.description: Number of articles per page, or false to disable pagination (DEFAULT_PAGINATION in Pelican)
